attributes.action: change transport policy to reflect the fact that 71% of road accidents do not have speed as a contributing factor,.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A recent announcement by the DFT to the effect that the NSL would be reduced to 50 mph is further evidence that the government has misjudged the road safety issue. By their own statistics, speed is not a factor in 71% of accidents, so why does the government not mandate better driver training, invest in improvements to the most dangerous roads, and give the police the manpower they need to root out the most dangerous drivers?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
